name: The Golden Volleyball (Prototype)
description:
This game is about A.V.I. (Android Volleyball Instructor) on its way to find the golden
volleyball.
This is a prototype of the game. Some features have not been implemented in here.

The game is still buggy and can be difficult to play with.

The Inputs are A & D.

- D for Jump

- A for Shoot

Here is the link to the github:

https://github.com/Miazyn/AVF_Final_Week

The game is being overworked. You will find the link to that project there.

Programming done by Miazyn/  Artwork done by Maike#6346 & Jul#3855
